import React from "react"; import cloudsVideo from '/Users/marekpolgesek/Desktop/{coding, dev}/Frontend Projects/artist-page/src/images/clouds.mp4'; import NewReleasePhoto from './images/release.jpg'; const BackGroundVideo = () => { return (

Nansea

Upcoming Single Release 2023

There will be a new single, yey!

Kindness is an artpop anthem for reclaiming self-respect and love, because time's have been tough and the world's been unkind, so the least you can do is to be nice to yourself, right?! Written during the very early days of the pandemic during a very first acid trip, just released from an abusive relationship, staying over at friends', they went to bed. Now here you are, alone for the first time. Facing the mirror, thinking 'You better be nice to yourself, cause you only you will take of yourself now'



Kindness is set to be released by the end of summer 2023. You will be able to pre-order the single and watch the premiere of the video here!

); } export default BackGroundVideo;
